thread.title: Katie Hopkins and Exeter MP Ben Bradshaw in Twitter spat over Brexit marches

author: Jamie Hawkins
title: Katie Hopkins and Exeter MP Ben Bradshaw in Twitter spat over Brexit marches
text:
Katie Hopkins and Exeter MP Ben Bradshaw in Twitter spat over Brexit marches Rallies for and against Brexit were held in Exeter on Saturday Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now   Thank you for subscribing!   
Controversial Exeter columnist Katie Hopkins entered a war of words with MP Ben Bradshaw following Saturday’s Brexit rallies. 
Thousands of people across the UK took to the streets to protest the government’s plans to take the UK out of the European Union. 
Exeter was one of the cities to hold an anti-Brexit rally yesterday, where hundreds gathered to march through the city centre. Brexit protest march at Bedford Square, Exeter (Image: Bridget Batchelor Photography) 
There was also a pro-Brexit rally held at the same time in Exeter, on the other side of the High Street. 
Exeter Labour MP Mr Bradshaw attended the anti-Brexit rally along with what is believed to be more than 2,000 others, and after both rallies, Devon-based Hopkins had her say. 
She tweeted: “Well done to our Brexiteers. Standing up against the Remain Rally in Exeter. 
“ @BenPBradshaw clearly struggles with the concept of democracy. Is that the cash of #Soros in your pocket Benjamin? Or are you really pleased to see my friends?” 
Bradshaw replied: “.V pleased to have seen your small UKIP group as a reminder of all the broken promises made in the campaign & that Nigel himself called for a vote on the deal #FBPE #brexitshambles.” Brexit protest march at Bedford Square, Exeter Bridget Batchelor Photography (Image: Bridget Batchelor Photography) 
It isn’t the first time the two have shared disagreements with each other. In 2016, Bradshaw claimed he was heckled by the TV personality as he spoke to striking junior doctors. 
He tweeted at the time: “Proud to have been shouted at by my well-known Conservative constituent @ kthopkins while talking to #juniordoctors outside @ rdehospital .” Like us on Facebook
